byArtist.description: The artist that performed this album or recording.

duration.description: The duration of the item (movie, audio recording, event, etc.) in [ISO 8601 date format](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601).

inAlbum.description: The album to which this recording belongs.

inPlaylist.description: The playlist to which this recording belongs.

isrcCode.description: The International Standard Recording Code for the recording.

recordingOf.description: The composition this track is a recording of.
